\section{Appendix}

% Test biblatex \textcite command with BERT
\textcite{devlin2019bert} showed that bidirectional pretraining improves NLP tasks.

% Test \parencite with Vision Transformer
Vision Transformers have achieved strong results \parencite{dosovitskiy2021vit}.

% Test \autocite with contrastive learning
Self-supervised learning has gained popularity \autocite{chen2020simclr}.

% Test \fullcite for complete reference
\fullcite{radford2021clip}

% Test \footcite for footnote citation
See the foundational CNN paper\footcite{lecun1998cnn}.

% Test \nocite (include in bibliography without citing in text)
\nocite{goodfellow2016deeplearning}

% Citation that doesn't exist in bib file (for testing missing citations)
\cite{nonexistent_future_paper_2099}
